notes:
learn to crochet the flower power hexagon potholder - a cute and functional kitchen accessory. this fun hexagon design uses less than 1 skein of yarn, making it a perfect stash-buster project. 

this potholder is made up of 2 different hexagons (front and back) that are joined together as you crochet to make a double thick potholder. this means that you can use it safely in your kitchen without burning your hands or counters. 

> this potholder pattern is the 8th pattern in the **[2023 pot holders galore crochet-along][1]**. with the purchase of an ebook, you will receive a total of 12 (+1 bonus) potholder patterns (one pattern every month during the crochet-along). in december, you’ll receive the final potholder, along with the bonus pattern.

> the free pattern for the flower power hexagon potholder can be found **[here!][2]**

> the complete video tutorial can be found **[here!][3]**

> you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along **[here!][4]**
